title: Another Wink Lesson!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Umi, Umi! Look! Click ☆<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Ooh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>I’ve gotten good at winking, right!? I can even do multiple in a row. Watch!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Wow! Your winking is super cute!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ehehe~ I’ve practiced a lot since you taught me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Right, I remember. I’m glad I could help.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>It’s all thanks to the video I took.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>What!? That weird video!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hm? I don’t think it’s weird at all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I-Is that so......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah. And everyone from Nijigaku also wants to see your winking tutorial. May I show them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Whaaat!? N-n-no way! Please don’t do that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hmm, but it’s so helpful! I want everyone else to learn from it! Please, Umi~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Argh..... Th-then, how about we record a new one right now for everyone to use. It’ll be even better than the one before......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>What!? Record a new one!? Thank you, Umi! They’re gonna be so happy to see this~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
